definition: to be related/to entail/to involve/joint (liability etc)
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
to bear joint responsibility for sth/joint liability (law)

sentences.english: Precise and predictable patterns of this MEFP design allow the agile LAM to use aim point selection for precision effects and minimum collateral damage.
sentences.chinese: 在選擇當中自主估算精確效果和最小量連帶損害值。

sentences.english: This tutorial window, with the original search box, should still be here.
sentences.chinese: 教程的窗口，連帶原來的搜索框，應該還在這。

sentences.english: The partners shall assume unlimited joint liability for the debts of the enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 合夥人對企業債務負連帶無窮責任。

sentences.english: The new partner shall bear unlimited joint and several liability for the debts of the partnership incurred before he enters into the partnership.
sentences.chinese: 新合夥人對入夥前合夥企業的債務承擔無限連帶責任。

sentences.english: This is connected, obviously, with Hobbes's denial of free will.
sentences.chinese: 這說法跟霍布士否定自由意志明顯有連帶關係。

sentences.english: There are internal and external validity and effectiveness of untruthful joint and several debt.
sentences.chinese: 不真正連帶債務分爲對內效力和對外效力。
他是連帶被株連的犧牲品。

sentences.english: Such tort-feasors are jointly and severally liable.
sentences.chinese: 此種侵權行爲爲要承擔共同和連帶責任。

sentences.english: The hotel has a pool with bar and spacious sun terrace with loungers and umbrellas.
sentences.chinese: 酒店設有一個游泳池和一間連帶迷人海景露臺的餐廳。

sentences.english: But in spite of these associations, home and house are in reality very different.
sentences.chinese: 但儘管有這些連帶的關係，家與屋事實是很不相同的。

sentences.english: Overrule a plaintiff to require the other respondent the litigation solicit that the assumption connects to take liability to pay compensation.
sentences.chinese: 駁回原告要求其他被告承擔連帶賠償責任的訴訟請求。

sentences.english: Their home was destroyed — along with three puppies that were inside.
sentences.chinese: 最終這家人的屋子付之一炬，連帶屋中的三隻小狗。

sentences.english: He should undertake the duty of indemnity to the right spouse.
sentences.chinese: 應當承擔對受害配偶的連帶損害賠償責任。

sentences.english: Otherwise the original obligor and the new obligor are collectively and bisectally liable.
sentences.chinese: 其餘情況下，原債務人和新債務人承擔連帶責任。

sentences.english: In case there are two or more guarantors, they shall undertake guaranty liabilities jointly and severally.
sentences.chinese: 保證人爲二人以上的，相互之間負連帶保證責任。

sentences.english: All of the obligations of the Guarantor hereunder shall be joint several.
sentences.chinese: 擔保人在本擔保書項下承擔的義務均應是連帶的。

definition: to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
to lead to/to trigger/to initiate/to cause/to evoke (emotions)
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
